name: Running out of Light
description:
Press LAN HOST to play

The multiplayer part is also implemented, but not working well enough :,(

Press 1 or 2 to change Weapons


-----

You're lost with your friends in a strange dark place.
You have an almost useless flashlight, a shotgun and a little axe against the Dead
Be aware that your flashlight needs new batteries so you gotta find new ones.
